title: NM Christmas Cake
ingredients: ['175g raisins', '175g sultanas', '175g prunes, roughly chopped', '150g glace cherries', '50g dried blueberries', '50g dried cranberries', '50g crystallised stem ginger', 'zest of 1 large orange', '250ml brandy', '175g unsalted butter', '175g dark muscovado sugar', '4 eggs', '200g self raising flour', '1 Tbsp golden syrup', '1 Tbsp vanilla extract']
